item.title: 缉毒局正着手对大麻进行重新分类，大麻股因此大涨
item.description: 据美联社报道，美国缉毒署正着手将大麻重新归入危险性较低的毒品类别，这对大麻产业来说是一个历史性的转变。【原文：Shares of cannabis-related companies jumped Tuesday after the AP reported that the US Drug Enforcement Administration is moving to reclassify marijuana to a less dangerous drug category in a historic shift for the industry.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟股价因康卡斯特寻求 NBA 电视交易的报道下跌 10
item.description: 据报道，康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）正寻求取代华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares fell to an all-time low following a report that Comcast Corp. is seeking to replace the company as one of the broadcast partners for the National Basketball Association.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债券在摩根大通指数逐步生效前上涨
item.description: 随着摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Venezuelan bonds have risen to the highest levels in three months as JPMorgan Chase & Co. begins to increase the weight of the securities in widely followed emerging-market debt indexes.】

item.title: 英特尔股价遭遇几十年来最惨淡的一个月
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）股价在 4 月份的跌幅将超过 30%，这是该公司 20 多年来最糟糕的一个月，因为这家芯片制造商仍在努力实施扭亏为盈。【原文：Intel Corp. shares are on pace to close out April down more than 30%, their worst month in over 20 years, as the chipmaker continues to struggle with executing a turnaround.】

item.title: 化肥生产商马赛克因 15 亿美元的沙特交易而跃升
item.description: 全球最大的磷酸盐生产商之一莫赛克公司同意以约 15 亿美元的价格出售其在一家沙特合资企业中的股份，此举旨在提高资产价值的透明度。【原文：Mosaic Co., one of the world’s biggest phosphate producers, rose after agreeing to sell its stake in a Saudi joint venture for roughly $1.5 billion in a streamlining move aimed at boosting transparency on asset values.】

item.title: 拉巴纳所有人普伊格与股东首次公开募股募集 26 亿欧元资金
item.description: 西班牙美容和香水集团 Puig Brands SA 及其创始家族筹集了 26 亿欧元（约合 28 亿美元）的资金，在今年迄今为止欧洲最大的上市交易中，股票定价达到了市场范围的最高点。【原文：Spanish beauty and fragrance group Puig Brands SA and its founding family raised €2.6 billion ($2.8 billion), pricing shares at the top end of the marketed range in Europe’s biggest listing so far this year.】

item.title: 象牙海岸顶级可可生产商怀疑公平贸易豆存在欺诈行为
item.description: 象牙海岸暂停了其公平贸易可可项目，原因是怀疑该系统受到未经认证的可可豆的污染。【原文：Ivory Coast has suspended its Fairtrade cocoa program on suspicions the system was contaminated with beans that aren’t certified.】

item.title: 沃尔格林股价大跌，投资者 "无计可施
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. shares are capping off their worst month in more than five years as the troubled drugstore chain navigates a difficult turnaround that has caused Wall Street to flee the stock.】

item.title: 9 月以来最差回报率显示债券易受美联储言论影响
item.description: 本月的市政债券表明，所有信贷市场都容易受到利率居高不下的担忧的影响，出现了自 9 月份以来的最差表现。【原文：Municipal bonds this month showed that all credit markets are vulnerable to the worry over interest rates remaining high, producing their worst performance since September.】

item.title: 米莱伊赢得下议院对阿根廷改革的关键支持
item.description: 阿根廷下议院批准了一些上市公司的私有化以及哈维尔-米莱伊总统的综合法案中的其他关键章节，这对这位自由主义领导人来说是一次胜利。【原文：Argentina’s lower house approved the privatization of some public companies together with other key chapters of President Javier Milei’s omnibus bill in a win for the libertarian leader who had seen his first attempt to pass reforms fail in congress nearly three months ago.】

item.title: 华尔街 "宏观不可知 "的科技交易打破 ETF 记录
item.description: 投资者正以创纪录的速度投入追踪技术的 ETF，因为他们坚信市场上最大的股票几乎可以在任何经济周期中茁壮成长。【原文：Investors are plowing into technology-tracking ETFs at a record clip as conviction builds that the market’s biggest stocks can thrive in almost any economic cycle.】

item.title: 国债荒可能使美联储结束资产负债表紧缩的进程陷入困境
item.description: 在过去一年里，国债投资者曾因大量发行国债而苦恼不已，现在他们正准备面对相反的挑战：销售的回落使他们手中的现金充斥，而这些现金需要用于其他方面。【原文：Treasury-bill investors that tussled with a swathe of issuance over the last year are now preparing to confront the opposite challenge: A pullback in sales that leaves them awash with cash that needs to be put to work elsewhere.】

item.title: 罗格夫称市场将挫败对美联储施加的任何政治压力
item.description: 哈佛大学经济学教授肯尼斯-罗格夫（Kenneth Rogoff）说，金融市场将对美国总统迫使美联储放松货币政策的任何举动施加有效的限制。【原文：Harvard University economics professor Kenneth Rogoff said that financial markets would effectively impose restraint on any move by a US president to force the Federal Reserve into easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 道达尔与开关行业人士畅谈纽约上市事宜
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）越来越多地发出将其股票转移到纽约上市的声音，这使得欧洲巨头有可能受到美国投资者对石油和天然气公司更大热情的诱惑的讨论更加热烈。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is increasingly making noise about moving its stock listing to New York, adding to chatter around European giants potentially being lured by US investors’ greater enthusiasm for oil and gas companies.】

item.title: 大众提供 9 亿欧元收购以削减德国员工人数
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）正在向其德国员工提供价值 9 亿欧元（9.36 亿美元）的买断，以削减其庞大的官僚机构。【原文：Volkswagen AG is offering €900 million ($936 million) worth of buyouts to its German employees to whittle down its hulking bureaucracy.】

item.title: 知情人士透露，LVMH 集团正在考虑收购马克-雅各布斯（Marc Jacobs）的可能性
item.description: 据知情人士透露，路威酩轩轩尼诗-路易威登集团（LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE）正在为其旗下的马克-雅各布斯（Marc Jacobs）时装品牌寻找潜在买家。【原文：LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE is exploring options for its Marc Jacobs fashion brand amid interest from potential buyers, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔 "一开口"，美联储的下行风险就开始了
item.description:
他可能希望保持沉默，但说什么最终都会向市场发出信号

。【原文：

He may want to be boring, but saying anything still ends up sending a signal to markets

】

item.title: 下行风险增加，澳大利亚房价进一步攀升
item.description: 在借贷成本创下 12 年新高之际，供应短缺加剧了经济承受能力方面的挑战，受此推动，澳大利亚房地产市场在 4 月份进一步攀升。【原文：Australia’s housing market climbed further in April, driven by a supply shortfall that’s increasing affordability challenges at a time when borrowing costs are at a 12-year high.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称通胀数据让欧洲央行有信心在 6 月降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，4月份的欧元区通胀数据让欧洲央行有信心在6月份开始降息，然后继续以务实的步伐放宽货币政策。【原文：Euro-area inflation data for April give the European Central Bank confidence to begin cutting interest rates in June before continuing to loosen monetary policy at a pragmatic pace, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 据说采埃孚将为采埃孚生命技术部门的首次公开募股聘请银行
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，宝马等公司的汽车零部件供应商采埃孚腓特烈港股份公司（ZF Friedrichshafen AG）已为其被动安全系统部门潜在的首次公开募股挑选了银行。【原文：ZF Friedrichshafen AG, an auto parts supplier to the likes of BMW AG, has picked banks for a potential initial public offering of its passive safety systems division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着日元汇率飙升，芝加哥商品交易所迎来 2016 年以来日元交易最繁忙的一天
item.description: 据全球最大的受监管货币市场CME集团称，周一是自2016年11月以来日元现货交易最繁忙的一天。【原文：Monday was the busiest day for spot trading in the Japanese yen since November 2016, according to CME Group, the world’s largest regulated currency marketplace.】

item.title: 迪拜酋长的公司再融资 82 亿美元，发掘房地产市场繁荣潜力
item.description: 迪拜控股公司（Dubai Holding）再融资 300 亿迪拉姆（约合 82 亿美元）贷款，用于替换上个月吞并的两家国家支持的开发商的老旧设施，从而更好地利用该市房地产市场的繁荣。【原文：Dubai Holding refinanced a 30 billion dirham ($8.2 billion) loan to replace older facilities at the two state-backed developers it absorbed last month, better positioning itself to capitalize on a boom in the city’s real estate market.】

item.title: 随着 ETF 需求降温，比特币面临自 FTX 崩溃以来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 随着美国交易所交易基金对最大数字资产的狂热逐渐消退，比特币创下了山姆-班克曼-弗里德的 FTX 帝国崩溃以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Bitcoin is registering its worst month since the collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX empire as the euphoria around US exchange-traded funds for the largest digital asset subsides.】

item.title: 据说巴林将为沙特重要石油管道寻找投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴林正在为一条从沙特阿拉伯输送原油的重要石油管道寻找投资者，因为这个海湾地区最小的经济体正在寻求能源资产的货币化。【原文：Bahrain is scouting for investors in a key oil pipeline that transports crude from Saudi Arabia, according to people familiar with the matter, as the Gulf’s smallest economy looks to monetize energy assets.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉普拉托，欧洲央行不应在 6 月和 7 月同时降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）在接受 Platow Brief 采访时表示，欧洲中央银行应避免在 6 月和 7 月连续降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should refrain from back-to-back interest rate cuts in June and July, Governing Council member Robert Holzmann told Platow Brief in an interview.】

item.title: 北京进一步放宽非核心区域购房限制
item.description: 中国首都北京将允许家庭在非核心区域多购买一套住房，因为即使是中国最大的城市也在创纪录的房地产低迷压力下举步维艰。【原文：China’s capital city Beijing will allow families to buy one more home in non-core areas, as even the nation’s largest cities are buckling under the pressure of a record real estate downturn.】

item.title: 万科将退出非核心业务，剥离资产以实现资金周转
item.description: 根据周二股东大会的一份备忘录，中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co. will exit non-core operations and divest assets as the developer seeks to boost liquidity amid the sector’s unprecedented downturn, according to a memo from a shareholder meeting on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通胀乏力，商品 ETF 自 2022 年以来吸纳最多现金
item.description: 投资者将两年多来最多的资金投入到基础广泛的商品交易所交易基金中，因为他们押注通胀持续高企预示着对原材料的需求将持续强劲。【原文：Investors are putting the most money into broad-based commodity ETFs in more than two years, on bets that sticky inflation is signaling continued robust demand for raw materials.】

item.title: 奥尔斯特德和麦格理是澳大利亚海上风电首秀的首选公司之一
item.description: 澳大利亚政府批准了包括 Orsted AS 和麦格理资产管理公司 Corio Generation 在内的开发商进一步开展项目工作，旨在提供该国首个海上风电项目。【原文：Australia’s government approved further work on projects by developers including Orsted AS and Macquarie Asset Management’s Corio Generation aimed at delivering the country’s first offshore wind.】

item.title: 巴西失业率上升，央行准备降息
item.description: 巴西上个月的失业率增幅低于预期，这可能加剧了央行行长们对劳动力市场过热的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s jobless rate ticked up less than expected last month, likely adding to central bankers’ concerns that the labor market is running too hot.】
